title: Biometric appointment confirmations
dataVerified: Full name, case number, appointment date/time/location, ASC location
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Biometric status (scheduled/completed). Link to USCIS system (applicant only, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake biometric notices. Domain binding verifies USCIS. Application processing requirement. ASC attendance proof. Case timeline documentation. Prevents appointment fraud.
